kodaikanal.description: A scenic hill station with misty mountains and cool weather.

madurai.description: Famous for the Meenakshi Amman Temple and rich culture.

ooty.description: Popular hill station with botanical gardens and a toy train.

rameswaram.description: Sacred pilgrimage town with temples and the Pamban bridge.

hiri.description: hiri is this best family visting place.A serene hill station known for its waterfalls and lush greenery.best time to visit is from October to March. in krishnagiri district
